Text: I am sorry but can I ask if this movie have any extras, like making, etc
Always full untouched dvd 9's never anything removed all there.See the torrents.

thx for including the extras. when you have time, would you pls up the change up (unrated), the jacket, brooklyn's finest, crossing over, the machinist, tropic thunder (unrated), revolver, lucky number slevin and fight club? with untouched menu and extras. i apologize for such a big request but i cannot find those movies with menu and extras on any torrent sites. i realize that you cannot fulfill the whole request all at once but if you could do 1 or so every now and then it would be greatly appreciated. thx again for your hard work. regards.
